comment: Having a hard time removing filter to empty. Any one else have this problem?
Very good , easy to use and powerful. Feel little bit heavy because of motor on the top
It cleans dog hair off stairs really well and that's the reason I bought it, the only downside is having to empty the dust can three or four times for a flight of stairs.
I've not used it enough to be fair. I've just moved and vacuuming is not a priorty as yet.
Does a great job
Works great! I really like it and alot cheaper here then in stores!
just perfect thr size and everything... but regular price is little bit expensive... wait the sale... around  $138 is perfect for this product.!
Works great.  And only 8 pounds!

I just got this yesterday and so far am pleased. I bought this for touch up/quick cleanings in between vacuuming with my Kenmore canister vac. I only used it in the hallway and in our pet’s area and the dirt cup fills up fast. It is not too noisy but the blower is hot and blows on the users arm. Lightweight and easy to use. I like the smaller width of the beater brush for getting into smaller spaces. My only issue is the description said “dust away” attachment but it came with “hero” attachment which feels a little flimsy and is a little hard to maneuver.
It's top heavy & hot air blows on your hand. Wish it could stand up. Hard to store
I think this one is better than my last shark, however I miss the light!
Works great, good pick up, quite a few attachments with it, very handy that the top part detaches to use as a hand vac.
Very light, great for my bad back.
Some parts flimsy. Cleaning power, and idea good.  Design could be improved.
hair on carpeting, ease of use
I should’ve bought the model that prevent her from being wrapped around the thing.
Handy to clean under couches, etc. Very powerful.
Does a stellar cleaning job on floors and carpets.  -  Downside is that the dust trap must be emptied four or five times during each cleaning in order to achieve that stellar result
Works great! The cord is annoying. And the vacuum doesn't stand up by itself
Love this vacuum, it's our second one because our other one broke and we could not replace the part. Wish I could give it 5 stars but it was missing 3 of the accessories it said it would come with.

I have loved this vacuum.  I bought it last July, and it has worked great.  It has great suction and awesome versatility.  Today I found a large crack in the wheel that spins to clean carpet.  I had bought the extra warranty, so I called them.  They said a crack wasn't covered under the warranty.  I explained that it was used like a regular vacuum.  There was no reason for it to crack like that.  He said there was nothing he could do.  I looked on here and saw that Shark has a 5 year warranty on it's own.  I called them and no questions asked are sending me a new attachment head.  Wow!  Great customer service.  I gave 4 out of 5 starts due to the fact that the wheel broke, but I do still really love this vacuum.
Powerful suction.  I use it exclusively on hardwood and area rugs. Very pleased.
Great on hardwood floors.. could have more suction for carpet's
Great vac!! Does it all! Stairs hardwood and carpet
love it except for one thing, i love the length of the cord except it's a shame it doesn't have a retractable cord

This vacuum is everything I hoped it would be and more. Light, easy to use and very efficient. The best part is being able to use the attachments to clean the car and the stairs. Being able to avoid using bags is a huge plus. I have had it for several months and no complaints yet. I have already recommended it to others.
Great vacuum but wish it was cordless. Cleans great
Has good power and gets in tight spaces. The only negative is that it is top heavy and will not stand on it's own.
light weight handles well and very powerful
I wish it was cordless
Good price for this item 100usd....
So far so good, has great suction and picks up more dirt than I believed possible.  Small container for dirt but it is visible, so easy to see when it is full.
Works great! Getting used to the feel

Love all the attachments and the portability of this device. My only gripe if I had to identify one would be the size of the dirt chamber. You have to empty it very often. Other than this minor gripe, we love it.

Does a great job on both floors and carpets, especially good with pet hair. The only down side is the top-heaviness of the design. Unlike most vacuums, this one cannot stand freely on its own but must be pulled apart if you need to stop working even momentarily.
Top heavy and cumbersome but effective.
Only had for a few weeks but love it. It does a great job. The only thing that I can complain about is that it does not stand up by itself. You have to lean it against a wall or lay down.
this works great
Love it. Easy to handle
I'm giving it a 4 because I didn't receive my micro fiber pad. Sweeper seems to work really well.

The hardwood floor attachment that was described in the details, is not the same floor attachment. The one I received did not have a pad attachment or is able to even have one added, it is a very simple bare floor attachment.
Didn’t come with the hardwood floor brush like in the order had to order not in pressed with that is what it needed
It’s perfect for our small apartment. Works great on both the carpeted bedrooms and hardwood living room floors.
I love this vacuum. I gave it only 4 stars because I wish the container was larger.
Great sweeper for a person 70 yrs old. very easy to handle, goes under things easily.
Works great makes job easier and convenient.
A little top heavy but worked very well.... my daughter-in-law was very pleased with it
does a good job.
Best vacuum I’ve ever had!
I don’t like the fact that it cannot stand up on its own.
Works great but the canister is small requiring frequent emptying.  Also, it cannot stand on its own which is very inconvenient as you have to set in down on the ground or find a place to lean in.
This is a great tool - light weight with great suction - goes from bare floors to carpet very easily and does not lose suction.  Good buy for the price!
Love this small but flexible on.

I loved the ease of this vacuum and the excellent suction but I found it was a bit awkward with the motor being up at the top.It just wasn't for me with the problems I have with my arthritic hands. I found it got heavy after using it for a while. Also when you stop vacuuming you have to lay it down somewhere because you cannot stand it up. On a positive note it had excellent tools and could reach easily under beds and furniture. I used this for a few weeks and was actually disappointed to send it back, it is a great vacuum. If I were younger and stronger I would have kept it.
A very good product
I purchased a used unit and it arrived in like new condition it has exceeded my expectations very easy to operate and lightweight.

Great vacuum!  Light, easy to maneuver, love the no bag (even though I was skeptical), easy to store.I'm a canister kind of gal, but thinking I may have been converted.  The ONLY problem I have is that is does not go under furniture as far as my canister vac.
Lightweight and great performance!
It would be nice if it came with a hose for hard to reach places. Other then that it works great.
Excellent product for the money.  Did just as well as more expensive vacuums I’ve used in the past.

Yes it performs. Need to wait for its long term performance. Easy to handle, reaches all corners and difficult places, not done by my last vacuum. Has wire length long enough to cover whole drawing room area.
I LIKE IT
works and stores well
Easy to use; toolsgreat, including tool bag
Good product but bulky

For the price you get a lot of vacuum and accessories for the money.  Lots of power to clean but I couldn't tell if there really was 2 speeds to the motor or not.  when I flip the switch for the other speed there is no change in the sound of the vacuum or the performance.  But the performance is more than enough for what I need.
Suction should be better for the money.
Didn’t give it a 5 star only because it seems to made a little cheap. I had the more expensive model that I loved. Don’t get me wrong thos is a great product for the price.
Awkward and top heavy. Cleans ok

I love my Shark Rocket vacuum, the suction is amazing.  My only problem is that I would like to purchase a spare filter for it on Amazon because I want to use my Amazon Credit Card but apparently there are none available.  That is disappointing.

Excellent.  Small collection bin but not a problem since it is clear and visible.Power is great.  A little top heavy but the ease in mobility makes the top weight manageable.Great tool for the price.  Stores nicely in small space.

It took me months to decide which light weight vac to order.  I went to Lowe's and Walmart and gave them all a "feel".  You see, I've been attached to my 1958 Electrolux Gold and have dreaded giving it up. Yes, it's goldish-orange in color, just like our president.The motor still runs great, it cleans great, the darn cord retractor still works!  WHAT?  Why give it up?  This year it and I turn 59.  It's time for a change.  The hose is duct taped where it's split, there's electrical tape holding down a switch and the attachments all went to Canada after the election.  I have two wonderful ladies (they are US citizens, leave them alone) that clean for me twice a month.  The old girl ( the vac that is) is becoming a pain to haul out and lug around just to get up the day to day detritus.  PLUS we have recently added a puppy to our family.  I swanney his hair is more of a problem than Donald's.  So dog hair is a new addition to our collection.  At least I don't have to clean under the kitchen table after those sloppy grandkids leave.  That dog can lick a floor cleaner than Ms. Lewinsky can, well you get the picture.I looked at the cordless Dyson and when I saw I was only getting 6 minutes of run time for over $400.00 I might near fainted away.  At Lowe's I heft the full size models around a bit and realized it was more of the same old vac feeling there.Then I thought of Sir Elton!  You know, The Rocket Man! Elton John! and decided to reach for the moon.  Clean like a Ninja, Clean up like a great white tornado.I quickly unboxed and plugged in the Rocket.  It's a noisy little bugger.  I didn't hear two phone calls that I am sorry I missed.  I'll call you back tomorrow Rush!  It's strange having the weight of the machine in your hands and not at the floor attachment.  It requires more steering than a tiller fire engine on a back country road.  I honestly had to aim that sucker (pun intended) and concentrate on making sure I covered the whole floor.I'm sure I'll get accustomed to the new feel and it did clean well.  And even though it is corded the longer cord sure makes cleaning a lot easier.I'll let you know how my Shark is holding up after a month or so, but as of today I think I made the right choice.  Just going to take some time to adjust to all these new fangled attachments and still get it all done before the old man cuts on Fox News!  Oh wait maybe I'll run it during the show!!  "What did Hannity say?  Can't hear over the new vacuum cleaner!"

I like the light weight of the Shark Rocket. Easy to handle. Easy to clean up. Very powerful for such a small vacuum.Might be hard to hang on to for some people when using the highest power.  I would love it more if it were cordless with that much power.
Well worth the money. Cleans carpet really well a lot of suction. Very pleased
my husband used it first on my van  he says wow this is great when he  let me use it in the home I had to agree. we used all the attachments, it's really easy & light

I just moved into a 2000 sqft home and needed a vacuum.  I bought this and was very impressed with it.  I vacuumed my new home for the first time and couldn't believe how much dirt and dust was sucked up by this thing!  I emptied the canister about 5 times before it was said and done.  I recommend this to everyone.Why I gave it four stars instead of five.  The people shipped it in its original packaging.  They didn't put it in another box, they just threw the sticker on the vacuum box and called it good.  I hate it when passers by can see exactly what I bought just sitting there on my front porch.  It only takes one person to steal your package! For paying $200.00 I would expect a little more discretion with the packaging.  On the upside nothing was damaged inside the box.
I went from central vacuuming to the Shark Rocket Ultra-Light.  It's light; picks up beautifully, easy to use.  So far, so good!

this is a great little vacuum except for the cord. It should roll up into the unit instead of wrapping it up and down from the top to the bottom.the cord never lays flat when you you go and use it. it seems to always get stuck together when you release it from the unit.
I'm almost as happy as the lady in the advertisement is!
It is a little awkward to handle but does a good job.
Great little vacuum

Excellent cleaning power, very portable, and has a lot of attachments. What kept me from rating it 5 stars is it's a little hard to clean stairs, as no attachments seems made to handle the shorter width of the stairs.
A good product as advertised. Still owned a portable vac  sold  at Macy's a long time ago.

This was recommended by my mother who had spend thousands on other high tech canisters to compare this to.Pros: The suction of this is impressive! If this used a bag, I would be angerly replacing them every couple times with the mounds of debris this collects.  It's a piece of cake to empty directly into the trash; not that I vacuum cake a lot either.The swivel head is super easy to maneuver around every obstacle.  The cord is a bit longer than the usual. The power head is very durable.  It does require normal maintenance cleaning hair and thread off the roller; sadly that hasn't changed.Cons: It does take some getting used to this being top-heavy.  The canister can become full and required emptying before finishing.  What can I say, I have a couple cats, a dog and three long haired humans that frequent the place!  I hate that this chore has now become enjoyable!
Works very well. pleased with it. Too early to comment on thereliability, other than that everything is Ok.
Love it. Just a bit awkward to "park" when you want to dust or switch tasksas it does not stand up on its own.
I like it
Pat Oltman  - love the way it moves easily around furniture and it picks up everything
Loved it for the most part the only small thing that I didnt like was when I vaccumed hardwood the wheels dont really glide smoothly but other than that its wonderful
Lite weight and does a good job
